Docs.summary: Provides culture-specific information used by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] system themes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute Usage `<` *object property* `="{x:Static theme:PlatformCulture.FlowDirection}"/>` ## XAML Values *x:Static* The [x:Static Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). *theme* An xmlns prefix mapping to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] namespace in a specific assembly.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that specifies whether the primary text advance direction shall be left-to-right, right-to-left, or top-to-bottom.
